nodes.text: The Twenty-Third Pius Dea Crusade was a religious crusade launched by the Pius Dea-controlled Galactic Republic that occurred in 11,198 BBY. The Republic launched forces from Ord Segra against Bothawui—the homeworld of the secretive Bothans—and from Ord Dycoll against the warmongering Lanniks of Lannik.
The Twenty-Third Pius Dea Crusade first appeared in the 2012 reference guide The Essential Guide to Warfare, on a map of several of the crusades.
